bibl.title: Brit. Lib. Or. 4919 (2): An Unpublished Coptic Amulet in the British Library.
bibl.note: P. Lond. Inv. Or. 4919 (2). Small strip of parchment containing the incipit of the letter of Jesus Christ to Abgar, followed by the incipits of the four canonical Gospels in the order Mt, Lk, Jn, Mk. Prov. unknown, VI-VII CE.
bibl.seg: Sanzo Joseph E., Brit. Lib. Or. 4919 (2): An Unpublished Coptic Amulet in the British Library.

P. Lond. Inv. Or. 4919 (2). Small strip of parchment containing the incipit of the letter of Jesus Christ to Abgar, followed by the incipits of the four canonical Gospels in the order Mt, Lk, Jn, Mk. Prov. unknown, VI-VII CE.
